ygData.subject: AC Proof
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What kind of facts are going to satisfy people?  I ve given information that Verant has stated, and it is ignored.  I ve backed up each objection to this
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 19 Jul 1999, Jones, Brian wrote:
> Point: Anyone can state this. Now give us facts. What everyone has said
> for this thread is only conjecture. And the one thing I have found constant
> in EQ is that conjecture = assume (and you know the saying about assume).

What kind of 'facts' are going to satisfy people? I've given information
that Verant has stated, and it is ignored. I've backed up each objection
to this information with further information (Studded vs. Reinforced vs.
etc.) that is disregarded. I've given _facts_ and people have closed
their eyes and plugged their ears and sung the Smurf(TM) theme song...

Point: Anyone can 'prove' that they have contact with Verant. Emails can
be faked, IRC chat records can be altered... etc.

Regardless of this:

Excerpted from conversation with Geoffrey Zatkin, Arch-Mage of Norrath.
My text is >, Geoffrey's response follows.

---
>Another thing came up...
>Does armor have an intrinsic damage absorption stat? IE: Does plate
>amor with AC 5 absorb more damage than leather armor with AC 5?

only ac matters

> So... wouldn't AC be DAF (Damage Absoprtion Factor)?

yes
---

I've had other conversations with him about this, however, this was the
most recent I could find.

Hopefully that will help 'support' my position.

Drew
